original_text: And ye shall count unto you from the morrow after the sabbath, from the day that ye brought the sheaf of the wave offering; seven sabbaths shall be complete:
korean_text: 안식일 이튿날 곧 너희가 요제로 곡식단을 가져온 날부터 세어서 일곱 안식일의 수효를 채우고

sentences.original_text: And ye shall count unto you
from the morrow after the sabbath,
from the day that ye brought the sheaf of the wave offering;
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 흔들어 드리는 단의 첫 이삭을 가져온 날부터
